content: अंत्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [अंते भवति वसति &c, अंताय हितः; अंत-यत्] {@--1@} Last, final (as a letter, word &c.); last (in time, order or place) <ls>P. I. 1. 47</ls>; as ह of letters, Revatī of asterisms, Mīna of the zodiacal signs &c.; अंत्ये वयसि in old age <ls>R. 9. 79</ls>; अंत्यं ऋणं <ls>R. 1. 71</ls> last debt; °मंडनं <ls n="R.">8. 71</ls>, <ls>Ku. 4. 22.</ls> {@--2@} Immediately following (in <ab>comp.</ab>); अष्टम° ninth. {@--3@} Lowest (in rank, degree or position), undermost, worst, inferior, base, vile, wretched; °अवस्थां गतः <ls>Pt. 4. 110</ls> reduced to the worst plight; अंत्यासु दशासु <ls>Pt. 1. 336</ls> at perilous (critical) times; belonging to the lowest caste; चंडाल° स्त्रियः <ls>Ms. 11. 176</ls>; °स्त्रीनिषेविणः <ls n="Ms.">12. 59</ls>; अंत्यादपि वरं रत्नं स्त्रीरत्नं दुष्कुलादपि; शूद्राश्च संतः शूद्राणामंत्यानामंत्ययोनयः (साक्ष्यं कुर्युः) <ls n="Ms.">8. 68</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">3. 9</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">4. 79</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 148</ls>, <ls n="Y.">2. 294.</ls> --त्यः {@--1@} A man of the lowest caste; see above. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of a plant (मुस्ता) ({%<ab>f.</ab>%} also) (the roots of which are prescribed for colic). {@--3@} The last syllable of a word. {@--4@} The last lunar month <ab>i. e.</ab> Fālguna. {@--5@} A Mleccha, foreigner, barbarian. {@--6@} (In Vaiśeshika <ab>phil.</ab>) A name for the category विशेष; अंत्यो नित्यद्रव्यवृत्तिर्विशेषः परिकीर्तितः . <ls>Bhāṣā P.</ls> --त्या {@--1@} A technical name for त्रिज्या in astronomy. {@--2@} A woman of the lowest tribe. --त्यं {@--1@} A measure of number; 1000 billions (1000,000,000,000,000.) {@--2@} The 12th sign of the zodiac. {@--3@} The last member or term of a progression (series), the last figure; स्थाप्योंतवर्गो द्विगुणांत्यनिघ्नः <ls>Līlā.</ls>
